eelanga dawase udenma api genapu pan walata game gedarakata kiyala parippuwak hadagena.nudlas ekak dawalta hadagena game awidinna patan gaththa..kalin kawiyedith kiyapu lakegala gamata uthurin lassanata penna gaththa..dana gaththu widiyata lakegalata me nama hadenna godak katha thiyanawa kiyalayi kiyawenne.kohoma unath rawana raja samaye dandumonaraye lankawa desata dishawa hoyaganna bawitha unu gala nisath lakegala kiyana bawata kathawak thiyanawa.ee wagema me gala lankawa hadayen nisath lakegala kiyana bawa kathawakuth thiyanawa.lakegalata yanawanam tikak dushkara gamanak.habayi gamanen bagekatath wada durak pahasuwen yanna puluwan.game minissu kumbauru pala gahila ena kaleta harak bandala thiyanne me lakegala pamula pathana pradeshaye.lakegala naginawanam diga kambaa aran gihin gamane awasana hariya yanna ooni kiyalayi game aya kiwwe.gale koku dala kambaa bandinna puluwan widiyata sakas karala thiyanawalu.lakegala pena kotha wage eka mudune samathala bimaklu thiyenne.ethana rayak gatha karannama balagena enawanam thawath dawasak ee wenuwenma gatha karanna wenawa.api ehema lasthiyak nathi nisa wel yaya madin suriya arana karapu ganga paththata sendu una.ee yana atharamaga thamayi suriya arane kade thibunu thana ehema hambawenneth.
